trans-unit.source: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Definisce un oggetto in fase di progettazione che consente di compilare le grammatiche fortemente tipizzata runtime conformi al [vocale riconoscimento grammatica specifica (SRGS) versione 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: You can you construct an empty SrgsDocument instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile costruire un'istanza SrgsDocument vuota e compilare una grammatica aggiungendo istanze di classi che rappresentano elementi SRGS, ad esempio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: You can also construct an SrgsDocument instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile creare un'istanza di SrgsDocument da un file di grammatica SRGS conforme XML esistente, da un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o da un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: After the SrgsDocument object is created, it can be loaded into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object or compiled by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, enabling it to be read by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver creato l'oggetto SrgsDocument, possono essere caricata in un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>dell'oggetto o compilato <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, consentendole di essere letta da un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [creare le grammatiche con SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) nel [sistema vocale Guida alla programmazione per .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) per ulteriori informazioni ed esempi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>istanza.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: To build a grammar within an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance, add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.
trans-unit.target: Per compilare una grammatica all'interno di un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>dell'istanza, aggiungere le istanze di classi che rappresentano elementi SRGS, ad esempio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe da un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object used to create the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per creare il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: builder is .
trans-unit.target: builderis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class and specifies an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> object to be the root rule of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> e specifica un <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> oggetto sia la regola radice della grammatica.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the specified rule to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and sets it as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> rule for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore aggiunge la regola specificata per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>dell'oggetto e lo imposta come il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>regole della grammatica.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_root rule" name="root rule" href=""></xref> in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_root rule" name="root rule" href=""></xref> in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: grammarRootRule is .
trans-unit.target: grammarRootRuleis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class specifying the location of the XML document that is used to fill in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe specificando il percorso del codice XML del documento che viene utilizzato per compilare il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The location of the SRGS XML file.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del file XML SRGS.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: path is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: pathè una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class from an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that references an XML-format grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe da un'istanza di <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>che fa riferimento a un file di grammatica in formato XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that was created with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> XML instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>oggetto creato con il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
trans-unit.target: srgsGrammaris .

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly reference information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene informazioni di riferimento all'assembly di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The AssemblyReferences property returns a string collection containing a list of the assembly references.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà elemento AssemblyReferences restituisce una raccolta di stringhe contenente un elenco dei riferimenti all'assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code-behind information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le informazioni di codice per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The CodeBehind property returns a string collection that contains a list of the code-behind documents.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà il CodeBehind restituisce una raccolta di stringhe che contiene un elenco dei documenti di codice.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le informazioni delle impostazioni cultura per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e l'API Speech accettare tutti i codici paese di lingua validi.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il riconoscimento vocale utilizzando la lingua specificata nella proprietà delle impostazioni cultura, deve essere installato un motore di riconoscimento vocale che supporta codice paese di linguaggio.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: I riconoscimento vocale fornita con Microsoft Windows 7 funzionano con i seguenti codici di lingua, paese.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Regno Unito) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Inglese (Stati Uniti) - de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Tedesco (Germania) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Spagnolo (Spagna) - fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Francese (Francia) - ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Giapponese (Giappone) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Cinese (Cina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Sono inoltre consentiti i codici di lingua cinese (Taiwan) a due lettere, ad esempio "en", "fr" o "es".

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that contains the current culture information for <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto che contiene le informazioni delle impostazioni cultura correnti <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to Culture is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore da assegnare alle impostazioni cultura è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to Culture is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.
trans-unit.target: Valore da assegnare alle impostazioni cultura è <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether line numbers should be added to inline scripts.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se i numeri di riga devono essere aggiunti agli script inline.

trans-unit.source: The Debug property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if line numbers should be added for debugging purposes; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà di Debug restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se i numeri di riga devono essere aggiunto per il debug; in caso contrario la proprietà restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related namespaces for the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene gli spazi dei nomi correlati per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The ImportNamespaces property returns a string collection that contains a list of the related namespaces in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ImportNamespaces restituisce una raccolta di stringhe che contiene un elenco degli spazi dei nomi correlato nel <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programming language used for inline code in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il linguaggio di programmazione utilizzato per il codice inline nel <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Language property returns the programming language to which <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> is currently set.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Language restituisce il linguaggio di programmazione a cui <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> è attualmente impostato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la modalità per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Mode property returns a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> that determines the type of input that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> expects.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Mode restituisce un membro del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>che determina il tipo di input che di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>prevista.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>

trans-unit.source: The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.
trans-unit.target: I due valori possibili sono `Voice` per l'input vocale, e `Dtmf` per l'input di tonalità dual più frequenze (DTMF) che sono comunemente associati a un telefono.

trans-unit.source: The recognition mode of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di riconoscimento del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo spazio dei nomi di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Namespace property returns the namespace for the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Namespace restituisce lo spazio dei nomi corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'alfabeto fonetico del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination.
trans-unit.target: Alfabeto fonetico sono composti di telefoni, costituiti da lettere, numeri o caratteri, a volte in combinazione.

trans-unit.source: Each phone describes a unique sound of speech.
trans-unit.target: Ogni phone descrive un suono univoco della voce.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds.
trans-unit.target: Ciò si differenzia alfabeto latino, per cui qualsiasi lettera può rappresentare più pronunciate suoni.

trans-unit.source: Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those".
trans-unit.target: Provare a diverse pronunce della lettera "c" in "candy di parole" e "termine", o diverse pronunce di combinazione di lettere "th" l'elemento"parole" e "".

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set.
trans-unit.target: In System. Speech, è possibile utilizzare uno qualsiasi dei tre alfabeto fonetico per specificare la pronuncia personalizzata: alfabeto telefono internazionale (IPA), Universal Phone impostare (UPS) o il SAPI phone set.

trans-unit.source: The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: Nell'alfabeto fonetico specificato determina quale set di telefono che verrà usato per definire la pronuncia inline per <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>oggetti.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in PhoneticAlphabet.
trans-unit.target: I telefoni specificati in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A>devono corrispondere nell'alfabeto fonetico specificato in PhoneticAlphabet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [dizionari e caratteri dell'alfabeto fonetico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'alfabeto fonetico che deve essere utilizzata per specificare la pronuncia personalizzata nel <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la regola radice del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object must already be in the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> before it can be set to the **root rule**.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>oggetto deve essere già incluso il documento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>prima che possa essere impostato il **regola radice**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the root rule for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object by using an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile impostare la regola radice per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>oggetto utilizzando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>oggetto come argomento per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>costruttore.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rule that is designated as the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la regola che è designata come la regola radice del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rules that are currently defined for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di regole definite per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method on the Rules property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>oggetti per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A>metodo sulla proprietà regole.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: If you initialize an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and specify an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> is automatically added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Se si inizializza un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>oggetto e specificare un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>oggetto come argomento, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>viene aggiunto automaticamente al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>per <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rules defined for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce le regole definite per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the .NET scripting language for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il linguaggio di script .NET di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Script" name="Script" href=""></xref> property returns the current .NET scripting language for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Script" name="Script" href=""> </xref> proprietà restituisce il linguaggio di script .NET corrente per il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the Script property to null.
trans-unit.target: Viene effettuato un tentativo di impostare la proprietà di Script su null.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the Script property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Un tentativo di impostare la proprietà di Script su una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object to an XML-format grammar file that conforms to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Scrive il contenuto del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> oggetto in un file di grammatica di formato XML conforme al [vocale riconoscimento grammatica specifica (SRGS) versione 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that is used to write the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>che viene utilizzato per scrivere il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
trans-unit.target: srgsGrammaris .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'URI di base di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: XmlBase property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà XmlBase Ottiene un valore che viene utilizzato per risolvere gli URI relativi in una <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Suppose the value for XmlBase is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.
trans-unit.target: Si supponga che il valore per XmlBase è "http://www.contoso.com/" e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>contiene un riferimento di regola relativa a un altro documento, ad esempio `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
trans-unit.target: Verrà creato il seguente percorso assoluto del documento esterno: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.

trans-unit.source: The current base URI of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'URI di base corrente <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.
